generated_doNotEdit.title: Swell Behavior
generated_doNotEdit.description: Allows the creeper to swell up when a player is nearby. It can only be used by Creepers.

fields.title: Start Distance
fields.description: This mob starts swelling when a target is at least this many blocks away

fields.title: Stop Distance
fields.description: This mob stops swelling when a target has moved away at least this many blocks

fields.title: Priority
fields.description: As priority approaches 0, the priority is increased. The higher the priority, the sooner this behavior will be executed as a goal.
